name: optical-surveys-2009
title: Optical Surveys (2009)
description: Preliminary trajectory of an Ohio State University GPS receiver on the glacier main branch tracked by optical survey. Coordinates are local and arbitrary.

contributors.name: Shad O'Neel
contributors.roles: Performed the research and processed the data.

fields.name: t
fields.description: ISO 8601 date and time in UTC (YYYY-MM-DD'T'hh:mm:ss'Z').

fields.name: x
fields.description: Meters along an arbitrary x-axis (theodolite: 5000 m).

fields.name: y
fields.description: Meters along an arbitrary y-axis (theodolite: 5000 m).

fields.name: z
fields.description: Elevation (m) relative to an abitrary height (theodolite: 1000 m).
